ADMIN.delete_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete this data?

engagement.title: TYPICAL CLIENT ENGAGEMENT PHASES
engagement.step_one_sub: Our cyber threat intelligence services team will discuss your catalyst event(s) and key investigative and intelligence priorities. At the close of this discussion, we’ll know if we can add value through an ongoing relationship.
engagement.step_two_sub: We dig deep into the circumstances of your cyber threat and investigate to enrich the data and provide evidence that delivers on your intelligence requirements.
engagement.step_three_sub: You receive actionable findings from the investigation:
engagement.step_three_sub_two: The actor’s or group’s tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs)
engagement.step_three_sub_three: The infrastructure associated with the actor or group
engagement.step_three_sub_four: Options for you, including ongoing monitoring of new actor infrastructure.
